text: @realDonaldTrump Oh, right, COVID-19 destroyed all your achievements.  Not a difficult feat since they did not prevent you from playing more golf in one year than Obama played in eight.  So you are back again at square one.  KAG was not a good acronym any ways.  Some never-Trumper might say KGB.
